basics.name: Simon Gheeraert
basics.label: Software Engineer - Looking for a final year Internship starting in April 2018

work.summary: Upcall is a human-powered outbound sales & marketing calling platform
highlights: Development of new features on the Upcall platform (Angular, Webpack and several libraries)
Update of the public website (HTML, CSS)
Creating tech-oriented disruptive innovations for Paris Digital Lab partners in a lean start-up methodology
Industrial Production Dashboard for Renault (Java, Angular)
Multi-tracking application for La Poste (React Native, Django, Node)
Smart Contact for Orange (Android, Node, AWS)
Development of a website with the following features : register, login, complete a survey or also give a feedback about a user (Python, Django, SQL, Heroku)
Development of a simple website for a customer of the Junior-Enterprise of CentraleSupelec (Wordpress, HTML, 1&1)

work.summary: The Generative Objects platform enables non-developers to generate enterprise applications directly from business rules
highlights: Development of generated web applications using the Generative Objects platform
Collection and reuse of OpenData in a web application
Using REST API and coding in C#/.NET, development of an autonomous connection to Open Data sources

courses: Machine Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Deep Learning

education.studyType: Intensive preparation courses for the highly competitive entrance exams to the Grandes Ecoles

projects.name: Industrial Production Dashboard for Renault Digital and the Boston Consulting Group
projects.startDate:
undefined-During this project, we are designing and developing an Industrial Production Dashboard for a major automaker company. This dashboard will be used to provide users information about their line of production.
• Use of Angular2 and the Foundation CSS Framework
• Implementation of a data visualisation map, built and edited by the user-01

projects.name: Multi-tracking application
projects.startDate:
undefined-Project for La Poste, the french post Office, we develop a hybrid mobile application (for iOS and Android).
The goal of this project is to develop an application which can track multiple carriers, give a better user experience and suggest new services.
We are part of a five-member team (3 developers, 1 designer and 1 project manager) for this project.
• Use of React Native and Redux in order to build the mobile application
• Use of API.ai in order to use a simple chatbot
• Use of NodeJS, Express and MongoDB in order to build our back-end
• Use of Python in order to parse mails and send mail
• Use of Heroku in order to deploy the servers
• Use of MLab for the database-01

projects.name: Smart Contact
projects.startDate:
undefined-Project for Orange, a major international telecommunications company, we develop an Android application on the 6.0 Android version (Marshmallow). 
The goal of this project is to develop an application retrieving the most relevant contacts that the user is likely to call or message at the time he uses the application.
• Use of Android Studio for developing the Android application
• Complex algorithms for getting the most relevant contact list-01

projects.name: Autonomous navigation of a robot
projects.startDate: undefined-With a school mate, using ROS (Robot Operating System) on Linux and Python, we developed an algorithm which allowed the robot to detect any obstacle, to scan his surroundings, to choose his next unexplored direction and to reach this place without troubles. The robot was a Turtlebot.-01

projects.name: Android musical application
projects.startDate: undefined-Conception and development of an Android musical application allowing to cut songs and display differents sounds in the same time using a database. Use of the integrated development environement Eclipse, the language Java and the database SQLLite.-01
